card-chest1: Bank error in your favor. Collect $200.',
card-chest3: From sale of stock you get $50.',
card-chest4:
"Get Out of Jail Free." 
This card may be kept until needed or sold/traded.
card-chest5: Go to Jail. Go directly to jail. Do not pass Go, Do not collect $200.
card-chest6: Grand Opera Night. Collect $50 from every player for opening night seats.
card-chest9: It is your birthday. Collect $10 from every player.
card-chest14: You are assessed for street repairs: Pay $40 per house and $115 per hotel you own.
card-chest15: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect $10.
card-fortune1:
Advance to Illinois Ave. 
If you pass Go, collect $200.
card-fortune2:
Advance to St. Charles Place. 
If you pass Go, collect $200.
card-fortune3: Advance token to the nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total 10 (ten) times the amount thrown.
card-fortune4: Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay owner twice the re tal to which they are otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
card-fortune6:
Get out of Jail Free. 
This card may be kept until needed, or traded/sold.
card-fortune8:
Go to Jail. Go directly to Jail. 
Do not pass GO, do not collect $200.
card-fortune9: Make general repairs on all your property: For each house pay $25, For each hotel pay $100.
card-fortune11:
Take a trip to Reading Railroad. 
If you pass Go, collect $200.
card-fortune12: Take a walk on the Boardwalk. Advance token to Boardwalk.
card-fortune13: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.
